website_summaries.verdict: Its speedy operation and overall dependability makes it a top choice.
pros: This DVD player stands out for its ease of use
Has fast and slow playback to either scan a show quickly or catch every detail of a scene
cons: Remote doesn't have an eject button
Remote buttons may be a bit small for some people

customer_reviews.title: Cheapest, worst DVD player I’ve ever purchased.
customer_reviews.text: Being that the brand was Sony and the reviews were decent I decided to buy this DVD player off amazon for my daughters dvd selection. It is nothing like anything else Sony- doesn’t work 3 out of 4 times you put a dvd in it. Everything is cheap and our DVD player from 15 years ago works far better. When you initially put a dvd in it won’t play for 10+ minutes and you need to keep turning it on and off to get it to work. Save your money and buy any other brand this one is horrendous.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: After two weeks, the remote went out (or possibly ...
customer_reviews.text: After two weeks, the remote went out (or possibly the unit's ability to recognize the remote) and it started vibrating every time a disc was inserted. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: David VanDyke

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, excellent product equal happy customer. I just receive this product along with other today. which I'm very pleased so far with this product. For those that are thinking about purchasing this product. I have posted a few of the product. On the other hand, it was a great product and, fast shipping A plus.
customer_reviews.author: denzel

customer_reviews.title: it's just not good. That said
customer_reviews.text: Takes multiple attempts to load DVDs. if a DVD is already in the DVD player, you can't just turn on the unit from the remote, and hit "play." has to be opened, closed etc... sometimes multiple times... it's just not good. That said, once it does get going, remote operation is seamless and smooth and the picture is great. It's just frustrating because it takes more effort than it should to get it going but once past all that nonsense, it the will do a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper and cheaper with every purchase
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I've purchased Sony DVD Player models in this order, DVPSR500H, DVPSR510H and DVPSR510H. The first had an on/off light and counter display light. The second had just the on/off light only and this one doesn't have any display of any type. You can't tell if it's on or off just by looking at it. This is stupid! It just gets cheaper and cheaper. One of the most fundamental features of any piece of electronics is an off/on light. The various features of all these DVD players from Sony has just been fair. Never again!!! The photo is showing the player "On". Would you know it?
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: Dead on Arrival - Loading tray wouldn't function
customer_reviews.text: The order was delayed, so when it finally arrived I was excited to set it up and try it out. First, it arrived with literally no packaging, only the box that the DVD player comes in with a label attached. As soon as I saw that I thought...not good. Well, sure enough I plugged it in and tried to put a DVD in and the tray wouldn't open. It only opened about 1/2''. I very gently helped it out and it fully opened, but I pressed close on the remote and, again, it closed about 1/2". I packed it up and sent it back. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: Razman

customer_reviews.title: R.I.P.  Off
customer_reviews.text: After my experience with this player AND Sony service, I'm firmly swearing off Sony anything ... cameras, TV's, audio, whatever. Disgusting that they expect the customer to pay for a refurb that probably won't last any longer than the original. I hope there will be a prevailing class action suit against Sony.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Drone

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are incomprehensible, won't play DVD's
customer_reviews.text: The machine takes a long time to load. The menu will not come on. Pressing play leads to nothing happening for all but two of my dvd's. The Sony support site is of no help, and I cannot find better instructions. I am not a techie, so I need something relatively simple-- I thought this would be it. I don't know if it's me, or if I got a lemon. edit: After 11 months of very light use, it's not me, it's the machine--it just doesn't read DVDs anymore. My husband unplugged the Fire stick, and it still doesn't work. I used it 4 times total, maybe. So it's a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: annie b

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: I got this on July 5, 2019 today is July 28, 2020 I went to watch a video and it would not work. It hasn't even been used that much. Over the last year we probably used it a total of 5 months. Our DVDs are like new the DVDs have absolutely no scratches or dust they're like new. All I can say is thank the Lord that this piece of crap didn't cost a lot. I WILL NOT BE RECOMMENDING THIS DVD PLAYER TO ANYONE.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger White

customer_reviews.title: It has Multi disc resume- a great feature missing from other DVD players
customer_reviews.text: During the past few years every DVD player I purchased would not remember or keep track where I was on the DVD after I either turned the power off or removed then reinserted the disc. Finally, I found this one - problem solved! It has multi disc resume... So now when I take a dvd out to play another, then put it back in it remembers or resumes where I left off! It also picks up where I left off after turning the power off then back on. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: Works Fine
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheaper player that works fine. I like to watch the occasional DVD and this serves that purpose. It does not have a lot of extra features, which is the way I prefer it as I seldom use such things. I put the DVD in, watch the movie turn it off. I rate it five stars as it is what it is. You could pay mkore for something fancier, but this works.
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS A HIDAY

customer_reviews.title: Easy!
customer_reviews.text: This was a (basic) DVD player that we needed to occasionally use to watch favorite DVD. We have all the streaming services, however, sometimes a good old fashioned disc does the trick. This was easy to install, worked perfectly, and didn't break the bank. Order HDMI cables though as they aren't included.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Arnold

customer_reviews.title: An okay basic DVD player, nice enough picture, but...
customer_reviews.text: One of the things I looked for when I bought this aide from its ability to connect to our entertainment system was its ability to play DVD-R's. The description said it was capable. The first one I attempted to play it will not play. I decided to check other reviews of this player, and others say the same thing... this payer will not play DVD-R's. Since I have DVD-R's I wanted to play, this purchase was a loss for me. Although my Logitech universal remote cannot control the DVD player's power, it is a good basic player.
customer_reviews.author: JacobJordan

customer_reviews.title: Inconvient .....
customer_reviews.text: If you pause the dvd and are gone for more than 15 mins, the unit will shut off and you must start the dvd from the beginning. This means you must listen to all the ads, etc. at the beginning and start the program you were watching at the beginning. In other words, your place is not saved. How ridiculous is this. If I had known, I never would have bought this unit. Yes, I know some people wouldn't use this feature, but for me it is essential. On the plus side, the picture is better than my old dvd player from 2007.
customer_reviews.author: Josette Collines

customer_reviews.title: Not even an attractive paper weight.
customer_reviews.text: wont play any sort of dvd.... new, out of the box. I bought it for a remodel playroom for the kids.... just over 30 days, i plug it in..... will not play this format. a new movie. sad..... didn't realize I needed to try "new" items upon receiving them, just so I can return it. $50 down the drain, and I now will be more leary... i thought amazon vetted their merchants better. I read the bad reviews.... but since amazon allows people to review who somehow got the item free...., I guess I need to lend more weight to the negatives than the positives.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Won't load about 50% of Netflix DVDs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this player as I thought the Sony reputation made it more desirable than other no-name brands. I found that the player won't load many of the Netflix DVDs I receive. Netflix says the issue is not with their discs, though I tried one of the non-working discs in another Sony player and it didn't work in that one either. I wouldn't recommend this DVD player. Amazon did allow me to return the player even though the return window had passed.
customer_reviews.author: Keith H.

customer_reviews.title: I’ve had this player for 5 years
customer_reviews.text: I bought this identical model DVD player 5 years ago. I lost the remote control for it while moving. My old one works great, I just don't have a remote control for it. So I bought this second one and I put my old one in my bedroom. Bottom line: It’s a long lasting, well built DVD player with an excellent picture. I highly recommend it. I’m glad I now have two of them.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara B

customer_reviews.title: Plug Play & Enjoy!
customer_reviews.text: I love when everything is in the box and if you have a little common sense you can simply plug it in and play. It took , me five minuets to set it up and play a DVD. Two minutes of that time was moving furniture to get to the outlet. Perfect for the price. Simple, so easy to set up and use. The picture is clear and bright. I played dvd's I burned as well as store purchased movies.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: No issues so far. You can't beat the price for the quality you get. Guess we'll see how long it lasts. Were pretty ruff on dvd players. Not physically...I mean my wife watches movies and falls asleep with dvd player on. So most of our dvd players get used 5 hrs a day till I wake up and shut it off before work. So far so good...
customer_reviews.author: Ratherbshooting

customer_reviews.title: have a DVD player is a GREAT backup. I still have a ton of DVDs ...
customer_reviews.text: I know, I know, DVDs are old school and who in the world still needs them, right? Well, guess what, when you have a cabin up in the mountains in a really rural area and your satellite dish has interference issues during a storm, have a DVD player is a GREAT backup. I still have a ton of DVDs from back in the day when that's what everyone had, now they still have a longer life span than the dusty collection at Goodwill. Whenever we can't get regular TV, we turn on one of our movies, so far this DVD player has been great.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn A

customer_reviews.title: Just what you need.
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from a similar Sony model that just started to conk out after about eight years of frequent use. The upconverting technology seems to have improved in the interim. It took seconds to install with the HDMI cable. The machine is unbelievably lightweight and slim, and oh is the price ever right!
customer_reviews.author: Auntie'sBoy

customer_reviews.title: It seems to work great!
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit shopping for DVD players in 2018 is kind of horrible. I often felt like I was trying to buy the one with the least number of terrible reviews. So far I really like this DVD player. It's small, quiet, and the remote is nice. Unfortunatly it seems like a lot of these players fail after months of use so we'll see about it's longevity. The physical buttons on the player are hard to press and really don't feel "nice". Also the power on light is extremely small and dim. On the plus side the remote works on my off brand tv volume without any sort of programing. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Remlinger

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!
customer_reviews.text: DVD Player is easy to use and works great. Nice and compact. Would recommend. Just don't get the insurance coverage as I did because they promise to email you the coverage but they don't! Contacted them twice and they wrote back don't worry, your covered. Really? If you could email that statement then why not email the coverage paperwork???
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great DVD player. First off I have to say thank you and great job to amazon. There was an error in shipping and they were quick and courteous to fix the problem and I got the product in a timely manner. Everything about the DVD player I love. It is small and easy to use. I didn't need anything with special features or frills. This is exactly what you want in a DVD player. I do think the quality is better using this than my previous one so the upscaling is working. If I needed another I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: BryanS

customer_reviews.title: Sony DVPSR510H DVD Player
customer_reviews.text: This is a second dvd player of the same model I already have in use in another room. I consider SONY DVD players the best of the best. For me, they never disappoint with quality playback and nice features. This unit is quite small but played on a nice size LED screen, you can see your getting a great picture. NOTE that this is NOT a BluRay player but rather a regular dvd disc player. Well worth the price I paid here at Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: MiddleClassMan

customer_reviews.title: NOT BLUE-RAY
customer_reviews.text: In the description it should say at the top, not the bottom, that this is not a blue-ray player. I assumed all DVD players were blue-ray or would say otherwise in the title but it doesn't state it at the top and it's not made to stand out and so it feels deceiving.
customer_reviews.author: ls

customer_reviews.title: No POWER light
customer_reviews.text: Finally got around to hooking up this CD/DVR player. Everything seems to work normally, good picture, good sound and the remote works. However, the power ON light does not illuminate- makes it a guessing game. Also the 2 digit remote code to program the remote to the TV does not work on my Jensen TV. Doing a google search reveals either a 3 digit or 4 digit code is required. No code at all is referenced in the owners manual. Really disappointed cause Sony usually makes decent product. Not worth my time and effort to seek warranty help.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Ritz

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This DVD player didn't even last a whole year and has hardly been used. I have verified that the remote is working but the player doesn't respond to any key presses. What's worse is that it is useless without the remote as there are no buttons on the player to scroll through the DVD menus. This was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I needed an inexpensive way to play dvd's through the tv using only an HDMI cable (not included, but I already had one on hand) and this does exactly that. it's low profile/really small so it fits right under my tv on the mantle and doesn't take up space. it's pretty bare bones but I literally just want to watch my dvd's from time to time and to be left alone about it otherwise, so this was perfect. picture quality is perfectly fine to me.
customer_reviews.author: hannah westphall

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t get any better!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived & the directions for installing this were so good that it took only several minutes to set it up! The picture quality is superb! What I really like the best is that the remote is so easy to use even opening the DVD tray! A great addition for any & all my TVs!
customer_reviews.author: Alice Smooch

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up, no USP port
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation with HDMI cable. Have not used it yet, but I do not foresee any problems. If I do encounter any, I will post again. Good delivery time and well packaged. Only disappointment was lack of USB port. My mistake because I did comparison with other units and missed the lack of that feature.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy it again. EVER.
customer_reviews.text: I would give this dvd player no stars if I could. I just took it out of the box and plugged it in & it will not play any Netflix dvd or any dvd in my collection. It says "cannot play this disc". I'd return it if I could but because I didn't need it right away I have exceeded the return days.
customer_reviews.author: E. Gaines

customer_reviews.title: Small but a Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: I just needed a way to play CDs and have a back up to my Blu-ray player. This unit will work fine as it plays CDs and an occasional DVD. The cabinet design is poor: the front panel slopes underneath so when you press down on any of the controls, there is no resistance as the unit tips down, the back lifts up and the unit rocks. Use the remote instead. It does offer HDMI, a feature that I preferred, but does not come with an HDMI cable. It does come with analog cables (Red-White-Yellow),
customer_reviews.author: wvj3ml

customer_reviews.title: Do your homework- read all you can.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this thinking, installation would be a breeze. It took several days to discover the remote that comes with this model dvd player cannot be programmed for it. Seriously - the instructions leave much to be desired - in contacting Sony, they replaced the player - that really wasn't faulty - it just doesn't work like the "manual" tells you. After reading product support info; cnet info, and you tube, I figured it out. Geez!
customer_reviews.author: DorothyFromKansas

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use and provides an excellent picture
customer_reviews.text: Straight forward DVD with excellent picture quality. Remote is also simple and easy to use. RECOMMEND!! 👍
customer_reviews.author: R.H. Smith - Indy

customer_reviews.title: Not a great DVD player at all
customer_reviews.text: Not a great DVD and doesn't always play certain DVDs, super cheap remote, also tough to see the little light to see if it's even on (design flaw). We stream most of our movies now, so luckily don't have to use very often as it often takes several attempts to load a movie....do yourself a favor and spend an extra $10 and buy a different brand or model!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. T

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: This DVD player is a piece of junk. It doesn't even play the DVDs half the time. Sometimes I have to push eject and close 3 times to get it to play. Who needs it. I had a DVD player just like this one before that stopped working so I should have known better. I thought it was maybe because it was getting old and it was cheap. This one I paid $10 more and the same thing. Spend a little more money and get a quality DVD player. This is crap.
customer_reviews.author: Dreama

customer_reviews.title: Great Player
customer_reviews.text: Most of my friends have Netflix... ( I know).... But I still enjoy watching a random DVD off my shelf. I bought this player in 2011 and for some odd reason, the door suddenly wouldn't open. Well, this replacement was almost $10 less here than at Best Buy. It stopped functioning on Friday evening.. I bought the replacement late Sunday evening.. it came Tuesday a day early... Go Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what we want - needs a shipping box.
customer_reviews.text: Good basic machine, works well for what we want. Kind of slow to load, but performs as expected. What wasn’t expected and had my heart racing with worry is that it comes a without a shipping box. So whether it survives it’s journey to you is pure chance. I would suggest saying it is a gift, so that it will be put in another box.
customer_reviews.author: Surfwalkerhhi

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: We use the DVD player to continually run a PowerPoint Presentation in our lobby about 8-10 hours a day. It does a great job. I create the DVD using Roxio Creator with a rewriteable DVD which I copy over again and again and things need to be updated. It absolutely does the job.
customer_reviews.author: CLC

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad little player
customer_reviews.text: Sony DVPSR510H DVD Player - not a bad little player. My biggest concern was the size - I wanted small enough to fit under the TV riser - this works very well. I'm not too pleased with the front panel buttons - they're thin silver buttons that require enough pressure to activate that you can easily push the player backwards. It's not a deal breaker but I thought it's worth mentioning.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: excellent DVD for the money
customer_reviews.text: For a straight forward DVD this unit will be hard to beat. The remote is a good size and you don't need tiny hands to work the buttons. It remembers where you left off when you turn it back on, even if you have played other discs in between. I'll remove my latest binge watch DVD, watch a movie or two, then when I get back to the binge watch DVD it remembers where I left off. Picture looks great.
customer_reviews.author: ALE

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, quality DVD player.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, affordable DVD player! We purchased our first from another retailer and were skeptical due to low price but we were (and continue to be) pleasantly surprised with the quality and performance. We were so pleased with it that we purchased another here on Amazon after our dual VHS/DVD player died. We have had ZERO problems with either one of the DVD players and have been using them for a few years. If you’re looking for a basic, inexpensive DVD player that works well, give this one a try!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: A dud.
customer_reviews.text: I can tell already this is a dud. I bought because of price, but you of course get what... it’s just clunky. I’d say buy something used or old at half the price. I’m not returning as I just received. Will update once I watch something. But not hopeful for great picture quality. I find when big brands do something super budget, quality suffers more than when no names do it. Let’s see.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Tollin

customer_reviews.title: Might be okay if it worked.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to give this a good rating. however, when it arrived, it did not work. It just showed the discs as "loading" but never really brought anything up. For a while I thought it might just be the disc, so I got a second one...It did the same thing. Just to verify, I tried the same disc on my other DVD player and it worked. disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Wilkinson Power

customer_reviews.title: super easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This DVD player was super easy to install. Just take your HDMI cable (sold separately, we bought the Amazon one) plug into the back of the TV and the DVD player, plug the DVD cord into a power socket and DONE! No blinking time or other things to "set" (you can customize the set up if you like). Bing, bang, boom- movies! Easy to use standard Sony controls. Two AA batteries and go! This has the three colored cables for older TVs. Why the HDMI cables were not included is a mystery.
customer_reviews.author: Wulfstan

customer_reviews.title: Boring (in a good way)
customer_reviews.text: The thing just works. Right out of the box. No fuss. No muss. It replaced a similar Sony model that lasted 5 years. We didn't have that one set up correctly and it ran 24/7. The disc drive motor just gave out after 5 years of that use/abuse. I took the old one apart after it failed. I couldn't believe how well made it was. I strongly recommend this model.
customer_reviews.author: Bill S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Just received my second one!
customer_reviews.text: I love this DVD player. I just bought my second one within three months of the first. I watch old DVD TV series so the pic isn’t all that great. It is not the DVD players fault. I can’t vouch for new DVD’s. I watch Jefferson’s, Different Strokes, Facts of Life TV series on DVD’s and they play great. I love this DVD player. Super easy setup too!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy D.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Other dvd players lost color capability, but the HDMI connection solves that.
customer_reviews.author: church reader

customer_reviews.title: An inexpensive DVD player that works.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a replacement for a broken player, this was the least expensive one with a brand name that I could find. It plays DVDs, not much else I can say. I'd buy this again if the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bad Example

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This player didn't work. I hooked it up and completed the "quick setup" and then tried to play a DVD, but after inserting a disc, it just told me again to "Insert disc". I tried 7 different DVDs, and each one just produced "Insert disc". Based on my experience and other reviews, apparently Sony is not the quality brand I thought it was.
customer_reviews.author: too_old_to_be_so_indie

customer_reviews.title: I bought it because I like it (oh yeah and it is cheap)
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying one of these. Because I loved the first one and I have two tvs. The HDMI port is needed and helpful. The size is perfect (some dvd players are so big for no reason). No frills, a few buttons and a green light. I have never had problems with it working the first or second one. The tray stands up fine to my 3 and 5 year old. So I buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit for sure, cd play iffy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the CD function to add to my system. Plays really nice, sound is great. I can’t stop a cd to shut down and restart at the same place. Instructions are for dvd use. Apparently the remote has a way to do it but no clear methods. So I can stop the cd and leave the player on and keep my place. Still looking for help.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Thompson

customer_reviews.title: DVDs started skipping
customer_reviews.text: Door jammed fairly frequently. Some DVDs were damaged. I forgot to return it so now I have a new paperweight. Not to say all are bad but the one I got is a lemon. This device is not going to take intense use. It is really designed for light duty as a external drive to a PC or desktop. Don't try to use it like a entertainment center.
customer_reviews.author: Timotheus

customer_reviews.title: Simple to install. Great sound. Great picture.
customer_reviews.text: Took all of 4 minutes to unpack and to install! Great picture and sound. SONY remote is already familiar to us. Only problem: this DVD player is so small and slim, that it doesn’t serve well as a base for our TV and cable box. So we figured something else (still being careful of heat venting holes) to prop the TV up high enough for us to see the picture. Other than that, we are thrilled with this SONY DVD player!
customer_reviews.author: Lewie D

customer_reviews.title: Its adequate but limited.
customer_reviews.text: This unit functions OK. Design of push buttons on top front of unit is not very good. The unit lifts off its feet in the back when pressing the buttons. It was cheap and I knew it wouldn't be great. If I want to use it to play CD's on my amplifier the remote does not control the volume - only the volume of the TV. The remote shape is clumsy.
customer_reviews.author: hd94

customer_reviews.title: This one works....Don't contact Sony!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Had to send the first one back... just received the first one and it didn't work... door tray didn't open... don't contact Sony, they give you a hard time and spent hours... Finally contacted Amazon and sent us another one... sent the broke one back to Amazon... The young lady at Amazon was nice and didn't waste our time...thanks
customer_reviews.author: DALE MCCREERY

customer_reviews.title: DVDs stop playing after a few minutes - Purchased as a Warehouse Deal
customer_reviews.text: DVDs will play for a few minutes and then the picture goes to black and my TV indicates "No DVD Input Signal." I've tried multiiple DVDs that I know to work and one Red Box rental. The same thing happens to all the DVDs. Perhaps that's why this DVD player was sold as a Warehouse Deal. I'll be returning the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Mertz

customer_reviews.title: Definitely like the HDMI connector
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. Definitely like the HDMI connector. That’s the reason I bought it and it looks great on my TV. Very small with very few features, but the remote control allows you to fully control the movie which is all we need. The only thing I might complain about would be the very small power indicator light is too small to even see from my sofa. So I never know if it’s on or not. Sometimes when I point the control and it doesn’t respond I think the machine is off, but I just needed to point the controller better. I would recommend this machine and probably buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: W. Lorenz

customer_reviews.title: getting worse. Cleaning the discs did nothing
customer_reviews.text: This unit worked well enough with very light use for about two years, then it started misreading discs, or not loading them, and would play for a while, then stop, all the while, as time went by, getting worse. Cleaning the discs did nothing... it's a cheap piece of junk. I have never dropped this, nor has it ever suffered a blow. It's just cheap junk. Sorry I purchased it. Will be buying another unit, but will NOT buy anything from Sony, which used to be my favorite brand. If they are content to put their name on this, then I've got to avoid them in the future. Bye, Sony...
customer_reviews.author: Yoga Sponge

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit for good price.
customer_reviews.text: A nice price for a Sony unit which is is a snap to set up. Excellent picture and sound quality for the price. Be careful with the disc tray it is a little on the flimsy side. Certainly meets all my needs. Remote control has various functions, works well. Make sure to point remote directly at the disc player.
customer_reviews.author: Granpa George

customer_reviews.title: BROKE WITHIN 2 WEEKS
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the worst products I've ever bought. I played only 5 DVD's before it's door refused to eject. I spent hours online troubleshooting, talking to tech support at Amazon and at Sony, and talking with the useless Sony supervisor. Sony "support" was anything but supportive, having no good solution for returning my costly DVD (part of an $80 set). Fortunately Amazon and I came up with an acceptable solution. Thanks Amazon! I won't be purchasing Sony products in future.
customer_reviews.author: Sue D.

customer_reviews.title: Good DVD Player
customer_reviews.text: I bought this DVD player for my parents who aren't very tech savy. Once they figured out how to install it I haven't heard any questions from them about it so it must be working great for them!!! lol
customer_reviews.author: Cheyne Flatt

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: none of the functions will work without jumping up and down on them with both feet either on unit or via remote. There is no visual display and if it does decide to play there's a weird delay of several seconds after hitting play before it begins. When it DOES play sound quality is awful.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Barham

customer_reviews.title: This was NOT a simple DVD player!!
customer_reviews.text: The seller was great to deal with but this was the 2nd DVD player I had purchased. I returned them both due to “error codes” coming up once it was plugged in and set up. Says “disc dirty”. I had a brand new disk. Think the machine sits in the factory too long. One was brand new. The other was from a discount place locally. Moving to another brand now.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ann 1228

customer_reviews.title: DVD PLAYER STOPPED READING DISC
customer_reviews.text: This DVD player is defective as it stopped reading the disc after a few months. It continues to state "Insert Disc" instead of playing the disc long after a disc is inserted. This is not a good DVD player, and I would not recommend it based on the poor performance of the one I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Milt

customer_reviews.title: The Single best DVD player I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Some key features that made this stand out from the rest - Plays practically chipped disks. The Laser is so strong most DVD that you would have had to throw away can be played here. - Multi-disk resume lets you watch part of one season of a show and pick up where you left off a week later in the same place. - Options for screen size, backround, and almost anything else you can think of. Its 2014 and people want their highly technological players with USB ports, app channals like netflix and so on. But for a plain old DVD player, this is one of if not the best choice. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Koenigs

customer_reviews.title: this is my first bad review. Three days ago 4/23/18 this dvd player ...
customer_reviews.text: I've written many reviews for all the items I bought from Amazon, this is my first bad review. Three days ago 4/23/18 this dvd player started to drop the video (no picture) while the audio still played. I gave it a couple days to see if it would clear up....It didn't! I went to my order sight to find that Amazon pulled the return notice 5 days ago. Now I'm stuck with a DVD player that is malfunctioning, and this is a Sony!!
customer_reviews.author: jerseyboy

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: We had one of these for over 5 years. We like to have something playing while we sleep at night so it ran on loop for 8+ hours at a time. It finally and understandably gave out recently so we just got a another one. Picture quality was just fine as far as I'm concerned but I'm not a real stickler.
customer_reviews.author: T. & A. Wog

customer_reviews.title: It works wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: Thank you. The price makes it a great buy. For some reason my Magnavox no longer is receiving cable signal, and since it was a recorder, the signal got blocked. This is my first Sony product, and i must say so far, its been a few weeks and the picture, sound and quality is beautiful for my DVD's
customer_reviews.author: Toni Tee Pam

customer_reviews.title: Easy to program
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this DVD player for elderly technologically challenged mother. Easy to hook up to TV using Belkin HDMI cable purchased from Amazon. Easy to program. Think even mother should be able to operate this player with no problem. Drawer does seem a little flimsy, but with care think it will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Angel's Helper

customer_reviews.title: À good low cost player
customer_reviews.text: This a a basic value priced player. I chose if for the brand and cost. It does the job. The buttons on the chassis are stiff and require a little extra pressure to turn the unit on or open. The remote has more features than you might want or use. It's buttons aren't as stiff as the player.
customer_reviews.author: Tom in Utah

customer_reviews.title: Look it over.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice player,works great,picture is very good, the problem is the remote. I didn’t notice until it stopped working that it had been taped together with black electric tape and after I got it open I could see that the batteries leaked. Even after a good cleaning and fresh batteries it is not working. It’s probably best to really look over both pieces before you accept this unit.
customer_reviews.author: terry contenta

customer_reviews.title: Asked for one thing and got another
customer_reviews.text: Amazon you're buggin me! I did a search for Blu Ray Players and you showed me this one. I'm sure it's a great player, it's just not Blu Ray like I asked for. It won't play my disc. I never thought you'd start showing me bait & switch players. Just show me what I ask for.
customer_reviews.author: Peter De Mattia

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good to have if you need one. Small and compact so it doesn't take too much space. Easy to install and works fine so far
customer_reviews.author: GitKash

customer_reviews.title: Good for gifts. Does every type of optical except BluRay
customer_reviews.text: Good for gifts. Does every type of optical except BluRay including all the writable and dual layers. Upscales nicely. I have one thats a couple of years old and it has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Crash

customer_reviews.title: Fine basic DVD player works great
customer_reviews.text: I initially used an HDMI cable to connect to my TV. It improved the image quality of an older DVD and I was happy. NOTE however that CC won't work using an HDMI cable, so I had to hookup 3RCA cables in addition for DVD viewing when CC are needed. Image quality was still good. The input/source has to be switched from HDMI to AV if CC are required, also, the Sony remote wouldn't turn on CC but my [Samsung Smart] TV remote DID.
customer_reviews.author: April S.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a month
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these models at the same time. One stopped working after a month. The discs started stuttering and skipping until eventually the DVD player announced that a disc was "dirty." I didn't think it was a disc problem because it stopped playing all my discs. So, I ordered a DVD cleaning disc, thinking that maybe some dust got on the laser lens. Didn't work. Still does not work. The OTHER player is doing fine...but for how long? Would not recommend as I recall reading a review similar to mine before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna L. Dodge

customer_reviews.title: I like it. I also have it hooked up through ...
customer_reviews.text: Simple, small, and does what it's supposed to do. I like it. I also have it hooked up through my stereo, so I used it to play CD's through my stereo. Good picture. Good sound. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: jenja314

customer_reviews.title: Inferior Product
customer_reviews.text: Not much to like about this product other than the price. Very light weight which allows it to move around while inserting disc or turning on and off. After just 6 weeks, this unit began turning itself off in the middle of the video. Although it would restart where it left off, it would do this repeatedly. I always thought Sony made quality products until now. Warranty expired shortly before issues began.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! We had to replace our 20 year-old gem of a DVD player when the cats knocked the TV over squashing our old one. I had previously bought a piece of junk Sanyo DVD player that was super noisy and skipped a bunch. Buying a new one, I wanted to be sure to buy a nice quiet one that doesn’t skip. We have only had it one day so far but I am super happy with it. (One review said that the player does not have buttons on it- it does! No need to worry if the remote flakes out).
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S

customer_reviews.title: Cute Price, Cheap Junk
customer_reviews.text: This cute little SONY DVD Player arrived broken and apart! I threw it away, but was given a refund by Amazon. Brad Sills, Colorado
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Sills

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Operation
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this little DVD player. The sound is fabulous, the picture is wonderful, and the operation of this little DVD player is fantastic. You could not have made it any better. This is a stupendous product.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda

customer_reviews.title: It's worth about half the asking price, very cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: It's Very cheaply made. It's worth about half of what they're selling it for
customer_reviews.author: Tynan

customer_reviews.title: USED DVD player
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice DVD player for 5 months. Then it stopped being able to receive from the remote control, so I can't do much with it. When I looked into the order info to see about returning it, I discovered it is USED, which was never revealed during the purchase. And the return window is closed. :D
customer_reviews.author: Supermandi

customer_reviews.title: The player had a problem where the disk tray would ...
customer_reviews.text: The player had a problem where the disk tray would move in and out continuously every few seconds, with or without a dvd in the tray. This was a gift that was not turned on for the first time until the after the 90 day warrenty and return limit. Sony was of no help in trubleshooting the problem. Service would have involved me paying for shipment and labor. This brand new player will be thrown out, even though it has never benn used.
customer_reviews.author: Merton D. Corwin

customer_reviews.title: WHAT THE PLAER IS GOING TO DO;.
customer_reviews.text: SONY IN MOST CASES IS A VERY GOOD PRODUCT, BUT THIS DISK PLAYER IS NOT WHAT I EXPECT FROM THIS PRODUCT, IT IS VERY SLOW IN LOADING YOUR DISK- THERE IS NO SCREEN READ OUT TO TELL WHAT TRACK YOU ARE ON IN THE CD MODE, NOR A READOUT TELLING IT'S LOADING OR PLAY MODE AND THE ON, IS A VERY SMALL LED LIGHT LETTING YOU KNOW THE UNIT IS ON. BUT NO OTHER INFO WHAT IT IS DOING. BF
customer_reviews.author: MRFERD

customer_reviews.title: For the price it works and I can't really complain, we have used it about 40 times so far.
customer_reviews.text: Sony DVPSR510H DVD Player, with HDMI port (Upscaling), not sure why it has a rating for screen quality, it does not come with a screen. But I have not noticed a real difference in the video quality yet, But the player works, and I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Venes

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Productue
customer_reviews.text: Unit plays some DVDs fine. On others, I hear a faint popping, then no audio. I connected using HDMI cable, so it is not a connection issue. Discs are clean and TV is fine, so it must be an issue with the player. This is the second machine I have tried and have the same issues. Cannot recommend..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smalll and compact for the right price.
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It’s small and compact. Good price from a well known company. A quality product from Sony.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Edward Pipkin

customer_reviews.title: Really annoying. It's going in the trash
customer_reviews.text: This DVD player has given me problems from the beginning. I don't watch very many DVDs but almost every time I do it either won't read until I put it in and take it out several times or it freezes up. Really annoying. It's going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Chapman

customer_reviews.title: DVDs look good on big screen TV
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 60 inch TV only to find out that I can't watch DVDs on it. The image is too blurry. Then one day I decided to google and find out how everybody is coping with watching DVDs on the big screens, and I discovered this "upscaling" trick. So I bought this one - such a cheap deal on amazon - and it works just like I imagined. Everything looks nice and sharp and no longer blurry! Yah! The player works, the remote works. I bought a cheap HDMI cable here on amazon to go with it. I can't complain for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Puppy's Mama

customer_reviews.title: I was trying to play some restored movie dvd's and the snow and grain noise were terrible. I have Panasonic and Philips dvd players and ...
customer_reviews.text: They work and are cheap. But upscaling and video signal processing leaves a lot to be desired. I was trying to play some restored movie dvd's and the snow and grain noise were terrible. I have Panasonic and Philips dvd players and the video quality on them is FAR superior. With an exellent source they are great. But arn't all of them?
customer_reviews.author: eagle

customer_reviews.title: Set up was easy and the menu was a quick setup
customer_reviews.text: The picture is so clear. Set up was easy and the menu was a quick setup. Actually saw a model similar in a store that was running information video, Had been looking for just a DVD to replace the VCR/DVD older model I had been using. Didn't use the VCR anymore, thanks to DVR and the DVD was playing movie but there would be skips and the voice would go in and out. Thought it was time for a new DVD and when I saw this model in the store knew it was the perfect one.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: This thing is junk, you could crumple it like an empty can of Coke. Slow to respond to remote and mine was defective from the get go with no sound. Avoid this thing and remember, you get what you pay for. Pay for junk, you get junk.
customer_reviews.author: Perry

customer_reviews.title: Good value, works for the price
customer_reviews.text: great value device, I mean its small, and the buttons are small, so you have to really push on them very deliberately. But it does come with a remote, and the picture quality is of professional digital quality, also the sound quality when playing cd's is a warm digital., so for the price its a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: DJPORTS

customer_reviews.title: Remote on this DVD player does not work!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased two of these DVD players and neither remote worked right out of the box. Today I ordered a replacement remote from Amazon and I'm apprehensive that it won't work either. If it doesn't, I'm going to try a universal remote next time. It's very frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Evrard

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this DVD player
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this DVD player. I replaced my old player that would quit on half the DVDs I played. This one works great with every DVD I have tried, and it plays amazingly quiet. Love the remote and all it's features. Player is nice and small at 8.3 x 10 x 1.3 inches, fits nicely under the side of my TV.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Works good for a cheaper DVD player
customer_reviews.text: I've had this DVD player for a few weeks now and everything seems to be ok. It does have a slight running sound when playing a DVD, but nothing thats distracting. Picture quailty is fine for what this is a cheaper version of a DVD player.
customer_reviews.author: Linzey J.

customer_reviews.title: Sony Should Discontinue This Player
customer_reviews.text: I received the player today and found that the on-screen-display language was set to Spanish and the instructions that came with the unit were so incomplete or wrong that the language could not be reset. After being disappointed by Sony support in the past, I was not about to engage them in a "hunt" for a solution. So, I packed the unit up and shipped it back to Amazon for a refund. I purchased an LG player instead and it works great and the setup was straight forward and quick. Avoid this Sony player!
customer_reviews.author: NorthernProducer

product_meta.title: Sony DVPSR510H DVD Player, with HDMI port (Upscaling)
product_meta.description: Style:SingleExperience near HD picture quality and solid sound in a compact design. This versatile DVD player features fast/slow playback so you don’t miss a beat. You can even listen to your favorite CDs or tracks from your MP3 player.
feature_bullets: Ultra Slim, New Mid Size Design, HDMI Output, 1080P Upscaling, JPEG, MP3 Playback, Multi Disc resume, Multi band TV Remote, Energy Star
Video: DVD, DVD+R, DVD+R DL, DVD+RW, DVD R, DVD R DL, DVD RW; Audio: CD, CD R, CD RW; File Formats Supported: JPEG, MPEG1
NOTE: This is not a Blu ray player; POWER CONSUMPTION (STANDBY): Less than 0.5 W

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars5,195 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
